channel.title: Jekyll on Shan Data Scientist to be!
channel.description: Recent content in Jekyll on Shan Data Scientist to be!

item.title: Jekyll & Cookies[Mini-Post]
item.description: In May 2011 the EU passed a law that affects all cookie enabled websites. A cookie enabled website now needs to inform those who visit thier site that they are using cookies. If this is your first time on my site you would have seen the below. I use cookies to look at traffic on my site and to see how users found my site. My blog is created through Beautiful Jekyll and it took me a little while to implement this.
